field.name: amtsample
field.description: Amount of Sample in Sample Cup
field.tooltip: Enter in the amount (value only) of material to pipette into each sample cup.

field.name: sample1
field.tooltip: Enter the decription of sample 1. Example: Low-level sample/High negative sample/High-level sample/Low positive sample: prepared by adding X to X to target a value of Y S/CO; Low-level sample/High negative sample/High-level sample/Low positive sample: obtained with a analyte concentration of Y S/CO.

field.name: sample2
field.tooltip: Enter the decription of sample 2. Example: Low-level sample/High negative sample/High-level sample/Low positive sample: prepared by adding X to X to target a value of Y S/CO; Low-level sample/High negative sample/High-level sample/Low positive sample: obtained with a analyte concentration of Y S/CO.

field.name: amttimet3
field.description: Amount of Time on Board Time Point 3 Samples
field.tooltip: Enter in the amount of time the samples must remain on the instrument prior to testing (value only).

field.name: amttimet2
field.description: Amount of Time on Board Time Point 2 Samples
field.tooltip: Enter in the amount of time the samples must remain on the instrument prior to testing (value only).

field.name: nrep
field.tooltip: Enter in the minimum sample size for replicates.

field.name: evalstate
field.tooltip: Select the appropriate evaluation criteria statement (match to the PRD).

field.name: prdhours
field.tooltip: Enter the number of hours tested for the PRD.

field.name: prdvalue1
field.tooltip: Enter the PRD value in units for a bias requirement.

field.name: prdvalue2
field.tooltip: Enter the PRD value in %s for a percent bias requirement.

field.name: biassamples
field.tooltip: Enter the types of samples or controls and range that are evaluated against the bias requirement. Example: samples or controls < 1.00 S/CO.

field.name: pbiassamples
field.tooltip: Enter the types of samples or controls and range that are evaluated against the percent bias requirement. Example: samples or controls within the range of 1.00 to 4.00 S/CO.

field.name: obvalue3bias
field.tooltip: Enter the observed bias (number only) from table 1.

field.name: obvalue3pbias
field.tooltip: Enter the observed % bias (number only) from table 1.

field.name: obvalue2bias
field.tooltip: Enter the observed bias (number only) from table 1.

field.name: obvalue2pbias
field.tooltip: Enter the observed % bias (number only) from table 1.
